text: Question from someone just getting started—We manage our website’s design system in React + Storybook and would love to share those components in HubSpot so we don’t have to implement everything twice.  Is that something other folks have done?
Something we've dreamed of, but I've never seen it done in practice

I did a successful test with a mock design system I built in Vue Design System (<http://vueds.com|vueds.com>) but we don't acutally use it yet. It requires loading the compiled JS & CSS, and Vue production script on each page. I think there's a way to export reusable components in React as well, so you can probably test out something similar to see if it's feasible with your system.
Thanks for the input--exporting the components was my thought too.
